titles.title: To make improvements in the enactment of title 41, United States Code, into a positive law title and to improve the Code.
To make improvements in the enactment of title 41, United States Code, into a positive law title and to improve the Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

bill.summary: This bill makes technical and conforming changes to the U.S. Code that are related to the enactment of title 41 (Public Contracts) into positive law.
